rdf:Description.dc:title: La première nuit roman
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Marc Lévy
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Romance
Légende
rdf:Description.dc:description: L'amour est l'ultime aventure, mais l'aventure n'est pas sans danger...

rdf:Description.dc:title: La Joconde
La Gioconda
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Leonard de Vinci
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Lisa Gherardini
rdf:Description.dc:description: La Joconde est le portrait d'une jeune femme, sur fond d'un paysage montagneux aux horizons lointains et brumeux.

rdf:Description.dc:title: Fribourg/Freiburg, Archives de l'État de Fribourg/Staatsarchiv Freiburg, Archives du Chapitre St. Nicolas/Kapitelsarchiv St. Niklaus, CSN III.3.5 : Antiphonarium Lausannense. De Sanctis, pars hiemalis. Officium B.M.V. Commune Sanctorum
rdf:Description.dc:description: This antiphonary with musical notation, whose text corresponds to the Lausanne Ordinary, contains the winter portion of the de Sanctis, the Officium B.M.V. and the Commune Sanctorum. The parchment codex was written between 1510 and 1517 in the workshop of Master Ruprecht (Fabri) in Fribourg by 2 hands (A and B). The book decorations are by Jakob Frank of the Augustinian monastery of Fribourg and an assistant.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: e-codices - Virtual Manuscript Library of Switzerland
rdf:Description.dc:identifier: Fribourg/Freiburg, Archives de l'État de Fribourg/Staatsarchiv Freiburg, Archives du Chapitre St. Nicolas/Kapitelsarchiv St. Niklaus, CSN III.3.5
rdf:Description.dc:relation: Leisibach Joseph, Die liturgischen Handschriften des Kantons Freiburg (ohne Kantonsbibliothek), Freiburg 1977 (iter Helveticum, Subsidia 16), S. 42-44.
rdf:Description.dc:rights: e-codices / Fribourg/Freiburg, Archives de l'État de Fribourg/Staatsarchiv Freiburg (cf. https://www.e-codices.ch/en/about/terms)
